Screenshot showing unusable editor area
BTW, I am using build I200403160800.

Note: I had a second eclipse window open at the time. Although the window
containing the problematic editor became completely unusable, the second Eclipse
window continued to function correctly. I was able to close the problematic
window and open a new Eclipse window, and it appeared to function correctly.

Closing and restarting Eclipse caused the problem to go away.

I have found a way to predictably reproduce this.

1. Drag an editor to one side of the editor area so that there are two editor
workbooks
2. Drag the editor back on top of the original editor workbook's tab area (you
should be back to one editor workbook again).
3. At this point the selection colour for the editor you've been dragging should
be incorrect.
4. Close the editor that you've been dragging around.

At this point, all editors have stopped redrawing and the Eclipse window needs
to be closed.
*** Bug 55095 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I've seen slightly different behaviour - the workbench and the editors that were
not dragged will still function , but the dragged editor does not.
